name: SuperButton -  Design powerful buttons in Figma // Use variants and booleans for multiple states
description:
In this figma, I show you how to quickly create a button in Figma using auto-layout, variants and component sets.


You will find:


  1. Instruction
  2. Button Anatomy
  3. Button Variations ( Actions, size, shape, state, type of icons)
  4. Component Set
